<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basilisk Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=708)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 256 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) a melee attack with the affixed shield.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This slimy green stone glows with a strong light whenever the shield it adorns blocks a melee attack. When the eye is activated, the attacker must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save or become [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 minute as its body slowly stiffens in partial petrification.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
